com.twitter.heron.streamlet

Interface BaseStreamlet<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KVStreamlet<K,V>, Streamlet<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseStreamletImpl, ConsumerStreamlet, FilterStreamlet, FlatMapStreamlet, JoinStreamlet, KVConsumerStreamlet, KVFilterStreamlet, KVFlatMapStreamlet, KVIdentityMapStreamlet, KVLogStreamlet, KVMapStreamlet, KVRemapStreamlet, KVSinkStreamlet, KVStreamletImpl, KVToStreamlet, KVTransformStreamlet, KVUnionStreamlet, LogStreamlet, MapStreamlet, MapToKVStreamlet, ReduceByKeyAndWindowStreamlet, ReduceByWindowStreamlet, RemapStreamlet, SinkStreamlet, SourceKVStreamlet, SourceStreamlet, StreamletImpl, SupplierKVStreamlet, SupplierStreamlet, TransformStreamlet, UnionStreamlet

    @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface BaseStreamlet<T>
    A BaseStreamlet is a base interface from which both Streamlet and KVStreamlet inherit. It is essentially a container which has a name and a partition count.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Gets the name of the Streamlet.

      Gets the number of partitions of this Streamlet.

      Sets the name of the BaseStreamlet.

      Sets the number of partitions of the streamlet
